intro: A desperate fisherman makes a deadly deal with a talking fish that trades riches for pieces of his soul.
description:
You’re an indebted angler, trapped in a vicious cycle of borrowing and desperation. One dark, endless night at sea you haul up something unnatural: a talking fish named Cagliuso. It promises you riches — but its bargains come with terrifying strings.
In LOAN SHARK, the nets you cast bring more than fish. They pull you toward sacrifice, secrets, and a deadline you may never meet. The “loan shark” isn’t just metaphoric — something is stalking the waters, your time is running out, and every deal you strike pushes you deeper into the unknown."
• Short, intense experience – Designed for a compact but unforgettable playthrough.
• Underwater eye-cam mechanic – Watch the lure in submerged view, anticipate the bite, then pull fast while the depths watch you.
• Fish & gut mechanic – After you reel them in, you must gut the fish yourself… carefully. Mistakes may cut you.
• Surreal dialogues & meaningful choices – Meet Cagliuso and barter with a one-eyed talking fish. Every choice alters your path.
• Time pressure & looming threat – The loan shark is coming. The clock ticks. Something hides in the darkness.
• Atmospheric horror & creeping dread – The deep sea becomes your adversary; the familiar becomes monstrous.
